0.1.name: wordpress/gantry-presets-option-page
0.1.description: I wanted to give my client a nice and clean way to change the design appearance without giving them the access to the Gantry theme settings page, so I built this. Now you can use Gantry's Presets system and define the presets in the admin page, and your theme users or clients can select and apply one of those on the theme.
